text: When the Meteor Shot Across the Sky is a 2016 Chinese romantic drama film directed by Song Qi and starring Xu Nuo, Sun Lihua, Liang Yu and Yang Xiaorong. It was released in China by Beijing Jinyi Qiankun Entertainment on June 17, 2016. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Xu Nuo *Sun Lihua *Liang Yu *Yang Xiaorong ==Reception== The film grossed in China. ==References== Category:Chinese films Category:Chinese romantic drama films Category:2016 romantic drama films Category:2016 drama films
title: When the Meteor Shot Across the Sky
